data.title: Mini Hoard is made in Turkey in the factories of the Nokta
data.meta_description: Buy Mini Hoard from Shop Detectors at the same manufacturer price Nokta/Makro in the Turkey and we guarantee fast worldwide shipping
data.text:
The Nokta Makro Midi Hoard Detector: the best detector for 8-12 year olds!

The Nokta Makro brand innovates by offering the first metal detector for children specially designed for 8 to 12 year olds. Equipped with an adjustable telescopic rod, it can be adjusted to the size of your child thanks to its adjustable telescopic rod (from 82 to 109cm), to its arm rest adapted to the morphology of the youngest. In addition, its 18 cm disc and its featherweight of 880 grams will offer unequaled detection comfort.

The Nokta Makro Midi Hoard: The first detector for children waterproof up to 1 meter deep!

The Nokta Makro Midi Hoard Detector can be immersed in fresh water and salt water up to 1 meter deep. Its waterproofness will offer young prospectors versatility worthy of the best high-end detectors, allowing them to work on all types of terrain: fields, forests, meadows, beaches (dry sand and wet sand), and in water up to one meter depth.

The Nokta Makro Midi Hoard: A real playful and easy-to-use metal detector!

The Nokta Makro Midi Hoard is very easy to use with only 3 adjustment buttons, while having the most complete features available: iron discrimination, pinpoint to precisely target the detected object, depth indicator, and a battery indicator . The Nokta Makro Midi Hoard works on a frequency of 15 Khz, in Multi-tones using three types of sounds: a low sound, a medium sound or a high sound depending on the nature of the target. The higher the sound, the more the target is conductive and therefore potentially interesting.

- What is the price of the metal detector Nokta Mini Hoard?

The price of the metal detector device Nokta Mini Hoard is $ 119.00 .

- Why is the price of the metal detector Nokta Mini Hoard in my country different from the price of the factory Nokta Detectors in Türkiye?

The price of the device in your country may differ slightly due to your country’s calculation of customs duties, shipping costs and other tax payments that are added to the price of the device.

- What is the country of manufacture of the metal detector Nokta Mini Hoard?

The device Nokta Mini Hoard is manufactured and installed at the factory Nokta Detectors in Türkiye

- Is there a metal detector store that provides the device Nokta Mini Hoard in my country?

The device Nokta Mini Hoard is available in almost all countries and you can find all store addresses in the list of distributors.

- Is there a warranty for the metal detector Nokta Mini Hoard?

Yes, the device Nokta Mini Hoard is sold with a two-year warranty period. Some device accessories do not have the same warranty period.

- Can I order the purchase of a metal detector Nokta Mini Hoard directly from the factory Nokta Detectors?

You can buy a device Nokta Mini Hoard from the nearest distributor in your country, if the device is not available in your country, you can contact the factory directly and the device will be sent to you via express shipping service within a few days at factory price.

- What is the maximum depth of penetration into the ground detected by the metal detector Nokta Mini Hoard.

This device Nokta Mini Hoard can reach great depths underground if the treasure is large in size.

- Is this metal detector Nokta Mini Hoard German made?

The metal detector Nokta Mini Hoard was manufactured in Türkiye at the Nokta Detectors factory.

- Is this metal detector Nokta Mini Hoard original or an imitation?

The original metal detector is called Nokta Mini Hoard and it is made in Türkiye in a factory Nokta Detectors, beware of counterfeit devices made in other countries.

- Does the device Nokta Mini Hoard detect underground to a depth of 10 meters?

The metal detector Nokta Mini Hoard can detect at great depths if the volume of buried metal is important.

- Does the metal detector Nokta Mini Hoard distinguish gold from other metals?

Yes, you can with your device (the device) distinguish the golden metal among the rest of the other metals.

- Does the metal detector Nokta Mini Hoard distinguish silver from other metals?

Yes, you can with the device Nokta Mini Hoard distinguish silver metal from the rest of other metals.

- Does the metal detector Nokta Mini Hoard distinguish iron from other metals?

Yes, you can with your device Nokta Mini Hoard distinguish metallic iron from other metals.

- Does the metal detector Nokta Mini Hoard distinguish bronze from other metals?

Yes, you can with the device Nokta Mini Hoard distinguish bronze metal from other metals.

- Does the metal detector Nokta Mini Hoard distinguish precious metals from other metals?

Yes, you can with your device Nokta Mini Hoard distinguish the metal of precious metals from other metals.

- Does the metal detector Nokta Mini Hoard detect buried precious treasures?

Yes, you can with your device Nokta Mini Hoard find ancient buried treasures.
